etymology.interpretation: The character 山 (shān) visually represents the natural landscape of three mountain peaks. Its early forms used simple triangular shapes, evoking the upward, jagged contours of a mountain range.

examples.chinese: 我们去爬山(我們去爬山)。
examples.english: We are going to climb the mountain.

examples.chinese: 那座山很高(那座山很高)。
山上的风景很好(山上的風景很好)。
examples.english: The scenery on the mountain is beautiful.
